---
title: "Space Mission Presentation"
date: "`r Sys.Date()`"
output: ioslides_presentation
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
library("jpeg")
library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)
library(naniar)
```

## What Data, and Where is it from?

Sourced from [Maven Analytics](https://mavenanalytics.io/data-playground?page=5&pageSize=5)

```{r include=FALSE}
spacemission <- read_csv("spacemission/space_missions.csv") %>% clean_names()
```

```{r}
glimpse(spacemission)
```
```{r}
miss_var_summary(spacemission)
```


```{r}
spacemission <- spacemission %>%
  separate(date, into = c("year", "month", "date"), sep = "-")
```

```{r}
spacemission %>%
  group_by(year) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = year)) +
  geom_bar() +
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90, hjust = 1))
```
